chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is an iPhone 12 mini with the above problem:
One of the cameras doesn't focus correctly. I've tried all possible options (update, restart, settings) but the problem remains. You can't change the focal point. The second camera works fine.

Thank you for your help,

Hello Elisa, You will find your return label attached to this message. Your return package will be handled by Chronopost. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find the list of drop-off locations here: Before you prepare your return: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item here: https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product. 3. Remove any existing protective film or cover 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below. How to package your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, and your product should fit snugly inside so it doesn't move during transit. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside for identification in case the original label is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from both inside and outside before sending it. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transit. Your return is now ready to be sent! We'll inform you when it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product to repair the 05.06.24. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 11.06.24 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding.

Regards,
Reyhan from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
